title: Whisper in the Dark (18C77)
text:
Set:	Treachery & Deceit
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Men
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Bearer must be a follower. At the start of the maneuver phase, if you can spot a [Men] Man, the Free Peoples player must exert an unbound companion.
Rarity:	C
Notes:	Game text is an erratum.
